alert.note: Alert for Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 5:34PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FRESNO COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM PDT... At 533 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake Wishon, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail, and isolated heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Localized heavy rainfall may lead to nuisance flooding. Locations impacted include... Lake Wishon, West Woodchuck Meadow, Florence Lake, Blackcap Basin, Wishon Dam, Upper Burnt Corral, and Dinkey Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fresno-Tulare Lower Sierra; Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP; Upper San Joaquin River
